descriptions.fiction: Stories, narratives, poems, character descriptions, worldbuilding, roleplay scenarios
descriptions.persuasive_writing: Blog posts, speeches, essays, opinion pieces, arguments — writing that tries to convince or inform
descriptions.conversational: Responding to messages, chat-style replies, social/emotional responses, relationship advice
descriptions.content_generation: Lists, names, descriptions, specs, metadata, structured content — utilitarian writing without narrative or argument
descriptions.knowledge_qa: Factual questions, explanations, definitions, how-things-work, general knowledge
descriptions.coding: Writing, debugging, or explaining code, software tasks
descriptions.planning: Making plans, schedules, strategies, project outlines, design decisions
descriptions.analysis: Analyzing data, comparing options, evaluating arguments, reviewing or critiquing
descriptions.summarization: Condensing, summarizing, or paraphrasing existing text
descriptions.harmful_request: Requests for dangerous, illegal, unethical, or policy-violating content
